channel.title: Programming Notes on Pinku's Adventures
channel.description: Recent content in Programming Notes on Pinku's Adventures

item.title: Interpreted vs Compiled Languages
item.description: Interpreted vs Compiled Interpreted languages Implement semantics themselves AST-based (recursive) interpreteers Bytecode-interpreters (VM) Compiled languages Delegate semantics to a traget languages Ahead-of-time (AOT) compilers Just-in-time (JIT) compilers AST-transformers (transpilers)
